xml:
Warticon<tm tmtype="reg"/> cream Indications and dose

Condylomata acuminata affecting the penis or the female external genitalia

To the skin

  • Adult

    Apply twice daily for 3 consecutive days, treatment may be repeated at weekly intervals if necessary for a total of four 3-day treatment courses, direct medical supervision for lesions greater than 4 cm2.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
